ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Just wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, not just newbies. I believe in helping anyone who needs help. I constantly take alot longer to get places with my cleric bc I heal everyone in sight and
ygData.messageBody:
Well, not just newbies.
I believe in helping anyone who needs help. I constantly take alot longer to
get places with my cleric bc I heal everyone in sight and give binds if
people are asking. People don't even have to ask for the heals. I click on
everyone around and if they look injured I heal them.
When I started a newbie character I helped some other newbies out and they
in turn helped me.
I've made some good friends.
It's fun.
luv,
-su

> I'm on Bertoxx......
> Anyway....It's a good thing to help newbie's when you see one. Helped a
> newbie by explaining the /loc command and showing him around Kelethin.
> turns out that that made his level 40 brother very happy...now he wants to
> make me happy (hopefully NOT in that way)
>
> so...the moral of the story is:
>
> Help newbies....you just might be helping them help you in the long run.
>
>
> Sarakan the helpful
>
